Html:
two very tiny fixes to suggest, 2 MapProviders have duplicate names. This causes an issue when i create a list of map names available.

Suggested fix is something like this:

GoogleChinaSatelliteMapProvider.Name GoogleSatelliteMap --> GoogleChinaSatelliteMap
GoogleChinaTerrainMapProvider.Name GoogleChinaMap --> GoogleChinaTerrainMap

Very good thank you.

 

Follow up issue,i was trying to adjust my code to better handle the range of zoom levels available. I looked at your sample and find it hardcoded to max zoom=24. Moving the slider to this value caused the error below (google sat map, over omaha NE, zoom to max 24). I see that you have done some changes to handling of zoom in the code. Trying to determine how to know what min/max i can use for a zoom slider control - adjusting as needed to handle different map sources. Any clues where i can find info on this?

 

 

See the end of this message for details on invoking
just-in-time (JIT) debugging instead of this dialog box.
